name: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration - Collector's Edition
summary:
The Collector's Edition contains:
- Rise of the Tomb Raider 20 Year Celebration PS4 game
- Limited Edition Art Book – Exclusive Art celebrating 20 Years of Tomb Raider
- 12" inch tall statue of Lara Croft
- Model of Lara's Jade Necklace
- Replica of Lara's in-game journal
- Collector's Box
